original_text: So Abram went to live near the great trees of Mamre at Hebron, where he pitched his tents. There he built an altar to the Lord.
korean_text: 이에 아브람이 장막을 옮겨 헤브론에 있는 마므레 상수리 수풀에 이르러 거주하며 거기서 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓았더라

sentences.original_text: So Abram went to live near the great trees of Mamre
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아브람은 맘레의 큰 나무들 근처에 살러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: There he built an altar to the Lord
